twitter.title: 'Obamacare saved my life' South Berwick man says
twitter.description: SOUTH BERWICK, Maine — As the United States Supreme Court prepares to hear arguments Tuesday aimed at defunding the Affordable Care Act (ACA), a South Berwick man will travel to Washington, D.C. and tell his story at a rally on the courthouse steps.For Adam Kelley, 44, the coverage he and his family get through the ACA has saved his life and his family's financial security. Losing coverage or even the ACA subsidy would be devastating to him.Kelley has Crohn's Disease, an inflammatory
